description.compact: A list of all PHP magic methods.
A list of all PHP magic functions.
Processes the tokens within the scope.

param.description: The position where this token was
The position of the current scope.

comment.value: Determine if this is a function which needs to be examined.
Is this a magic method. i.e., is prefixed with "__" ?
PHP4 constructors are allowed to break our rules.
PHP4 destructors are allowed to break our rules.
If it's a private method, it must have an underscore on the front.
If it's not a private method, it must not have an underscore on the front.

description.compact: Processes the tokens outside the scope.

param.description: The position where this token was

comment.value: Is this a magic function. i.e., it is prefixed with "__".
Function names can be in two parts; the package name and
If it has a package part, make sure the first letter is a capital.
If it doesn't have a camel caps part, it's not valid.
Every function must have a camel caps part, so check that first.

param.description: The type of scope the test wishes to listen to.
The tokens that the test wishes to listen to
If true this test will also alert the

docblock.param: extending class when a token is found outside the scope, by calling the processTokenOutsideScope method.

throws.description: If the specified tokens arrays are empty

description.compact: The method that is called to register the tokens this test wishes to listen to.

docblock.description: DO NOT OVERRIDE THIS METHOD. Use the constructor of this class to register for the desired tokens and scope.

description.compact: Processes the tokens that this test is listening for.

param.description: The file where this token was found.
The position in the stack where this

return.description: Optionally returns a stack pointer. The sniff will not be

docblock.return: called again on the current file until the returned stack pointer is reached. Return ($phpcsFile->numTokens + 1) to skip the rest of the file.

docblock.param: opened the scope that this test is listening for.

docblock.return: called again on the current file until the returned stack pointer is reached. Return ($phpcsFile->numTokens + 1) to skip the rest of the file.

description.compact: Processes a token that is found outside the scope that this test is listening to.

param.description: The file where this token was found.
The position in the stack where this

return.description: Optionally returns a stack pointer. The sniff will not be

docblock.return: called again on the current file until the returned stack pointer is reached. Return (count($tokens) + 1) to skip the rest of the file.

description.compact: Registers the tokens that this sniff wants to listen for.
Called when one of the token types that this sniff is listening for is found.

docblock.param: file's token stack where the token was found.

return.description: Optionally returns a stack pointer. The sniff will not be

docblock.return: called again on the current file until the returned stack pointer is reached. Return (count($tokens) + 1) to skip the rest of the file.
